ProductInfo.Features:
2 pcs/pack. Single Channel Passive Video Transceiver. PAL/NTSC Real-time Video Transmission
10-20% Wire Costs Saved. Exceptional Interference Rejection and Built-in Protection Setting
Convenient Wiring Installation and Higher Cable Utilization Rate
Full-motion CCTV video at distances up to 2000ft. Male BNC allows connection directly to the camera or DVR. No Power Required
Video Frequency: DC To 5MHz. Impedance: Coax BNC 75 Ω, UTP, 100Ω. Video CMRR: 60dB typ. Attenuation: 0.5dB typ
ProductInfo.Name: R-Tech (1 PAIR) Single Channel Passive Video Balun Transceiver for Security Surveillance CCTV Cameras and DVRs: PAL/NTSC Real-time Video Transmission, With Exceptional Interference Rejection, Built-in Protection Setting, and Convenient Wiring Installation
